by.net.iozhukov.server.service

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.net.iozhukov.server.service.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object

    Simple HTTP Server.


    An instance of this object listens to the port specified in the designer and executes the work in a separate thread. If a request comes to him, it begins processing in the new thread.

    To start the work, it is necessary to call the method launch()
    Author:
    Ilya Zhukov

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.Boolean serverAvailable
      A field that displays the current status of the server
      private java.net.ServerSocket serverSocket
      The port on which you can small talking with the server
      private java.lang.Thread service
      The stream in which the server service is running

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Server(java.lang.Integer port)
      Constructor for instantiating an object Server If the specified port is busy, the program crashes

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getServerAvailable()

      void launch()
      This method starts the server service, and changes the internal status to available.
      void stop()
      This method changes the server's internal status to inaccessible, close server port and exits the application

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server(java.lang.Integer port)
        Constructor for instantiating an object Server If the specified port is busy, the program crashes
        Parameters:
        port - - port number. Type Integer.

    • Method Detail

      • launch

        public void launch()
        This method starts the server service, and changes the internal status to available.
        If the method is called on a running instance of the server, a message will be sent to the log, and nothing will happen.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        This method changes the server's internal status to inaccessible, close server port and exits the application

      • getServerAvailable

        public boolean getServerAvailable()
        It's just a getter nothing more
        Returns:
        - current server status

      • work

        private void work()
        Listens for a connection to be made to this socket and accepts it. After it starts processing the request in a new thread.
